Hi John, 
I hope you are receiving notes on your survey from other local government officials on the Knowledge Network! In addition to the responses I have posted two resources that I believe you will find interesting and useful as you prepare for your presentation. 
-Tech Knowledge and Governance icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/1317
-Communication Techniques in a Tech Savvy Town http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302685/Communication_Techniques_in_a_TechSavvy_Town
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
